displayProperties.description: Conjure a well of Light that continuously heals those inside it.
displayProperties.name: Healing Rift

displayProperties.description: Conjure a well of Light that increases weapon damage for those inside it.
displayProperties.name: Empowering Rift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Glide

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to teleport a short distance.
displayProperties.name: Blink

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with a strong initial boost of speed.
displayProperties.name: Burst Glide

displayProperties.description: A grenade that splits into many submunitions and covers a large area with multiple explosions.
displayProperties.name: Scatter Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that creates a Vortex which continually damages enemies trapped inside.
displayProperties.name: Vortex Grenade

displayProperties.description: A bolt of Void Light that forks into smaller bolts on impact that seek out enemies.
displayProperties.name: Axion Bolt

displayProperties.description: Hurl an explosive bolt of Void Light at the enemy, disintegrating those caught within its blast.
displayProperties.name: Nova Bomb

displayProperties.description: Strike an enemy with this melee ability to drain your enemy's life force and use it to recharge your grenade.
displayProperties.name: Entropic Pull

displayProperties.description: Hold  to overcharge your grenade, making it deadlier and more effective.
displayProperties.name: Chaos Accelerant

displayProperties.description: Void ability kills cause enemies to explode.
displayProperties.name: Bloom

displayProperties.description: Nova Bomb travels slowly and seeks enemies. Detonations shatter into smaller seeker projectiles. Fire your weapon at the Nova Bomb to detonate it early.
displayProperties.name: Cataclysm

displayProperties.description: Kills with this melee ability fully regenerate your health. For a short time afterward, kills restore additional health.
displayProperties.name: Devour

displayProperties.description: Consume your Grenade energy to regenerate your health. Grants the Devour effect.
displayProperties.name: Feed the Void

displayProperties.description: While the Devour effect is active, killing enemies extends its duration and recharges your grenade.
displayProperties.name: Insatiable

displayProperties.description: Nova Bomb creates a singularity which continually damages enemies trapped inside. Kills with Nova Bomb grant the Devour effect.
displayProperties.name: Vortex

displayProperties.description: Step between dimensions to subvert the laws of physics. Press  to teleport a short distance. Hold and release  to unleash a deadly Void eruption.
displayProperties.name: Nova Warp

displayProperties.description: This melee ability creates a Void explosion.
displayProperties.name: Atomic Breach

displayProperties.description: Hold  to convert your grenade into a short-range Void blast on release.
displayProperties.name: Handheld Supernova

displayProperties.description: Void ability kills grant health and melee, grenade, and class ability energy.
displayProperties.name: Dark Matter
